item.title: Docker with Jupyter Lab
item.description: I. 개요 V. Reference Working with Jupyter Notebooks in Visual Studio Code: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/python/jupyter-support 에서 Connect to a remote Jupyter Server 참조.
